Sample Diet Chart
--------------------------
 --> Breakfast at 8.30 am: 1 cup of boiled vegetables,2 glasses of water.
 -->Brunch at 10.30 am: 1/2 bowl of boiled red kidney beans or rajma with a sliced tomato and 2 glasses of water.
 -->Lunch at 12 noon:1 bowl of mixed vegetable soup and 1 cup of cooked brown rice with 2 glasses of water.
 -->Afternoon Snack at 4.00: 1 apple or pear and a glass of water.
 -->Evening Snack at 6.30 pm: 1 bowl of sprouts with a glass of water.
 -->Dinner at 8.00 pm: A bowl of boiled mixed vegetables and a glass of water.
